content: Wishing to be sincere in their thoughts, they first extended to the utmost their knowledge. Such extension of knowledge lay in the investigation of things.
translations: ita:Desiderando essere sinceri nei loro pensieri, in primo luogo estesero al massimo la loro conoscenza. Tale estensione del
